languages.text: "Рапорт, Ваша Светлость: все началось спустя полцикла после того, как свершилась трансляция. На самом деле и до того, говорят, этот ваш... странно себя вел. Словно начал слышать кого-то: кружил по палубе, огрызался на своем ксеносском, потом схватился за клинок и распорол себе руку — сам себе, представляете?! А потом — завыл и кинулся на людей".

traits.locale_text: "Рапорт, Ваша Светлость: все началось спустя полцикла после того, как свершилась трансляция. На самом деле и до того, говорят, этот ваш... странно себя вел. Словно начал слышать кого-то: кружил по палубе, огрызался на своем ксеносском, потом, говорят, схватился за клинок и вспорол себе руку — сам, представляете?! А потом завыл и кинулся на людей".
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

languages.text: "Permission to report, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! It started a few watches after the translation. Well, actually, they say this... associate of yours had been acting strangely even before that. It's as if he started hearing things: he was swivelling back and forth, barking something in his xenos tongue, then he grabbed his blade and sliced his hand open — his own hand! Then he suddenly howled and lunged at the people nearby."
languages.original_text: "Рапорт, Ваша Светлость: все началось спустя полцикла после того, как свершилась трансляция. На самом деле и до того, говорят, этот ваш... странно себя вел. Словно начал слышать кого-то: кружил по палубе, огрызался на своем ксеносском, потом схватился за клинок и распорол себе руку — сам себе, представляете?! А потом — завыл и кинулся на людей".

Then he suddenly howled and lunged at the people nearby."

traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

languages.text: « Permission de parler, Votre Seigneurie ? Tout a commencé quelques quarts après la transition. Enfin, en réalité, on avait signalé que votre... associé se comportait déjà de manière étrange avant cela. C'est comme s'il entendait des voix. Il se balançait d'avant en arrière, déclamant on ne sait quoi dans son babillage xénos, puis il a saisi son couteau et s'est entaillé la main. Sa propre main ! Alors, il a poussé un hurlement et s'est rué sur les malheureux qui se trouvaient à proximité. »
languages.original_text: "Permission to report, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! It started a few watches after the translation. Well, actually, they say this... associate of yours had been acting strangely even before that. It's as if he started hearing things: he was swivelling back and forth, barking something in his xenos tongue, then he grabbed his blade and sliced his hand open — his own hand! Then he suddenly howled and lunged at the people nearby."

traits.locale_text: « Permission de parler, Votre Seigneurie ? Tout a commencé quelques quarts après la transition. Enfin, en réalité, on avait signalé que votre... associé se comportait déjà de manière étrange avant cela. C'est comme s'il entendait des voix. Il se balançait d'avant en arrière, déclamant on ne sait quoi dans son babillage xénos, puis il a saisi son couteau et s'est entaillé la main. Sa propre main ! Alors, il a poussé un hurlement et s'est rué sur les malheureux qui se trouvaient à proximité. »
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

languages.text: 「報告の許可を、陛下！始まったのは、翻訳が終わってから数ウォッチ後でした。実はその前からも…御身の仲間は奇妙な行動をとっていたと聞いています。まるで何かが聞こえ始めたかのように前後に旋回し、異種族の言語で何事かを大声で怒鳴ったかと思えば、刃を掴んで自分の手を切り裂いたのです！そして突然雄叫びをあげ、近くにいた人々に突進しました」
languages.original_text: "Permission to report, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! It started a few watches after the translation. Well, actually, they say this... associate of yours had been acting strangely even before that. It's as if he started hearing things: he was swivelling back and forth, barking something in his xenos tongue, then he grabbed his blade and sliced his hand open — his own hand! Then he suddenly howled and lunged at the people nearby."

traits.locale_text: 「報告の許可を、陛下！始まったのは、翻訳が終わってから数ウォッチ後でした。実はその前からも…御身の仲間は奇妙な行動をとっていたと聞いています。まるで何かが聞こえ始めたかのように前後に旋回し、異種族の言語で何事かを大声で怒鳴ったかと思えば、刃を掴んで自分の手を切り裂いたのです！そして突然雄叫びをあげ、近くにいた人々に突進しました」
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

languages.text: “请允许我报告，大人！跃迁过了几巡之后，他就变成了这个样子的。呃，确切地说，他们说这个……说您的这位同伴，在这之前的表现就一直非常奇怪。他就像是听到了什么声音一样，不停地走来走去，高声喊着什么东西。随后他就抄起了刀，划开了自己的手……他自己的手！在那之后，他突然嚎叫起来，朝附近的人扑了过去。”
languages.original_text: "Permission to report, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! It started a few watches after the translation. Well, actually, they say this... associate of yours had been acting strangely even before that. It's as if he started hearing things: he was swivelling back and forth, barking something in his xenos tongue, then he grabbed his blade and sliced his hand open — his own hand! Then he suddenly howled and lunged at the people nearby."

traits.locale_text: “请允许我报告，大人！跃迁过了几巡之后，他就变成了这个样子的。呃，确切地说，他们说这个……说您的这位同伴，在这之前的表现就一直非常奇怪。他就像是听到了什么声音一样，不停地走来走去，高声喊着什么东西。随后他就抄起了刀，划开了自己的手……他自己的手！在那之后，他突然嚎叫起来，朝附近的人扑了过去。”
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, bitte um Erlaubnis, Bericht erstatten zu dürfen! Es begann einige Wachen nach dem Sprung. Nun ja, eigentlich sagen sie, dass Euer ... Gefährte sich schon zuvor merkwürdig benommen hat. Als habe er angefangen, Dinge zu hören: Er ist vor- und zurückgewankt, hat etwas in seiner Xenos-Sprache gebellt, sich dann seine Klinge genommen und sich die Hand aufgeritzt — die eigene Hand! Dann hat er plötzlich losgeheult und die Leute in der Nähe angefallen."
languages.original_text: "Permission to report, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! It started a few watches after the translation. Well, actually, they say this... associate of yours had been acting strangely even before that. It's as if he started hearing things: he was swivelling back and forth, barking something in his xenos tongue, then he grabbed his blade and sliced his hand open — his own hand! Then he suddenly howled and lunged at the people nearby."

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, bitte um Erlaubnis, Bericht erstatten zu dürfen! Es begann einige Wachen nach dem Sprung. Nun ja, eigentlich sagen sie, dass Euer ... Gefährte sich schon zuvor merkwürdig benommen hat. Als habe er angefangen, Dinge zu hören: Er ist vor- und zurückgewankt, hat etwas in seiner Xenos-Sprache gebellt, sich dann seine Klinge genommen und sich die Hand aufgeritzt — die eigene Hand! Dann hat er plötzlich losgeheult und die Leute in der Nähe angefallen."
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

languages.text: «¡Permiso para informar, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Todo empezó unas pocas guardias después de la traslación. Bueno, en realidad dicen que ese... socio de usted ya se estaba comportando de un modo extraño incluso antes. Es como si oyese cosas: se mecía de un lado a otro, soltando improperios en su lengua xenos, luego agarró su espada y se rajó una mano, ¡su propia mano! De repente aulló y se abalanzó sobre la gente que tenía cerca».
languages.original_text: "Permission to report, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! It started a few watches after the translation. Well, actually, they say this... associate of yours had been acting strangely even before that. It's as if he started hearing things: he was swivelling back and forth, barking something in his xenos tongue, then he grabbed his blade and sliced his hand open — his own hand! Then he suddenly howled and lunged at the people nearby."

traits.locale_text: «¡Permiso para informar, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Todo empezó unas pocas guardias después de la traslación. Bueno, en realidad dicen que ese... socio de usted ya se estaba comportando de un modo extraño incluso antes. Es como si oyese cosas: se mecía de un lado a otro, soltando improperios en su lengua xenos, luego agarró su espada y se rajó una mano, ¡su propia mano! De repente aulló y se abalanzó sobre la gente que tenía cerca».
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

languages.text: "Rapor vermek için izin istiyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Her şey, geçişten birkaç nöbet sonra başladı. Şey, doğrusu bu... Ortağınızın öncesinde de tuhaf davrandığı söyleniyordu. Sanki bir şeyler duymaya başlamış da... Bir o yana bir bu yana dönüyormuş, zeno dilinde bir şeyler bağırıyormuş, sonra da kılıcını alıp elini kesmiş! Kendi elini! Üzerine birden feryat edip yakınlarındaki insanların üstüne atılmış."
languages.original_text: "Permission to report, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! It started a few watches after the translation. Well, actually, they say this... associate of yours had been acting strangely even before that. It's as if he started hearing things: he was swivelling back and forth, barking something in his xenos tongue, then he grabbed his blade and sliced his hand open — his own hand! Then he suddenly howled and lunged at the people nearby."

traits.locale_text: "Rapor verme izni istiyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Her şey geçişin birkaç nöbet sonrasında başladı. Şey, doğrusu bu... Partnerinizin onun öncesinde de tuhaf davrandığı söylenmekteydi. Sanki bir şeyler duymaya başlamış gibiymiş: Bir o yana bir bu yana dönüyormuş, zeno dilinde bir şeyler bağırıyormuş, sonra da kılıcını alip elini kesmiş! Kendi elini! Ardından da aniden feryat edip yakınlarındaki insanların üstüne atılmış."
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow
